The Sinhala: language caption of the post translates to English as: "Do keep in mind that there are other people in this country, leave them also something to eat and drink."
The photos were also shared on other Fac: 4. A reverse image search of the photos led to articles from different sources, such as a US-based food magazine and reports of bare shelves at supermarkets in the US after a winter storm in 2015.
